title: Brainstorm business ideas
content: Help me brainstorm 5 innovative business ideas in the sustainable energy sector, including potential challenges and how to overcome them.

title: Plan a workout routine
content: Create a beginner-friendly 4-week workout routine focused on building strength and endurance, with exercises I can do at home without equipment.

title: Learn a new language
content: Teach me basic Spanish phrases for traveling, starting with greetings, ordering food, and asking for directions. Include pronunciation guides.

title: Recipe suggestions
content: Suggest three easy vegetarian dinner recipes using common pantry ingredients like rice, beans, and vegetables. Include step-by-step instructions.

title: Productivity hacks
content: Share 10 productivity hacks for remote workers, focusing on time management, minimizing distractions, and maintaining work-life balance.

title: Explain quantum computing
content: Explain quantum computing in simple terms for someone with no background in physics. What makes it different from classical computing?

title: Write a short story
content: Write a short sci-fi story about a world where dreams can be traded like currency. Keep it under 500 words.

title: Travel itinerary
content: Plan a 7-day itinerary for a trip to Tokyo, including must-see sights, local food recommendations, and budget tips.

title: Debug code
content: Help me debug this Python code snippet that's giving an error: print('Hello' + 5). Explain what's wrong and how to fix it.

title: Motivational advice
content: Give me motivational advice for overcoming fear of failure when starting a new project. Include real-life examples.
